description.zh-cn: 中国经济学家，中国共产党党员。曾任《新华日报》编委、中共中央统战部副部长、中国社会科学院副院长、汕头大学校长等职务。
description.en: Chinese economist and a member of the Communist Party of China. He held various positions including member of the editorial board of Xinhua Daily, Deputy Head of the United Front Work Department of the CCP Central Committee, Vice President of the Chinese Academy of Social Sciences, and President of Shantou University.

description.zh-cn: 位于广东省揭西县，是许涤新的出生地。
description.en: Located in Jiexi County, Guangdong Province, it is the birthplace of Xu Dixin.

description.zh-cn: 位于广东省揭阳市的一所中学，许涤新曾在此就读。
description.en: A middle school in Jieyang, Guangdong, where Xu Dixin studied.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国广东省的综合性研究型大学，许涤新曾在此就读。
description.en: A comprehensive research university in Guangdong, China, where Xu Dixin studied.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国福建省厦门市的综合性大学，许涤新曾在此就读。
description.en: A comprehensive university in Xiamen, Fujian, China, where Xu Dixin studied.

description.zh-cn: 一所曾存在于上海的大学，许涤新曾在此就读。
description.en: A former university in Shanghai where Xu Dixin studied.

description.zh-cn: 介绍许涤新加入中国共产党的人物。
description.en: The person who introduced Xu Dixin to join the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的主要政党之一，曾在1935年至1937年间逮捕并监禁许涤新。
description.en: One of the major political parties in the Republic of China, which arrested and imprisoned Xu Dixin from 1935 to 1937.

description.zh-cn: 标志着中国抗日战争全面爆发的事件。事变后，许涤新得以获释。
description.en: An event that marked the outbreak of the Second Sino-Japanese War. After the incident, Xu Dixin was released.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党领导的八路军在南京设立的办事机构，曾为释放许涤新进行交涉。
description.en: An office established in Nanjing by the Eighth Route Army, led by the Communist Party of China, which negotiated for the release of Xu Dixin.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的理论刊物，许涤新曾担任其责任编辑和编委。
description.en: A theoretical journal of the Communist Party of China, for which Xu Dixin served as a managing editor and editorial board member.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在国统区公开发行的第一张大型机关报，许涤新曾任其编委会委员和党总支书记。
description.en: The first major official newspaper publicly circulated by the Communist Party of China in Kuomintang-controlled areas. Xu Dixin served as a member of its editorial board and secretary of its Party general branch.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争时期中国共产党在国民党统治区设立的派出机构。许涤新曾在其宣传部工作。
description.en: An agency established by the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China in the Kuomintang-controlled areas during the Second Sino-Japanese War. Xu Dixin worked in its Propaganda Department.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的早期领导人之一，许涤新曾协助其工作。
description.en: One of the early leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, whom Xu Dixin assisted.

zh-cn: 中国共产党香港工作委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在香港的领导机构，许涤新曾任其委员兼财经委书记。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Hong Kong, where Xu Dixin served as a committee member and secretary of the Finance and Economics Committee.

description.zh-cn: 一份在香港发行的报纸，许涤新曾是其编委。
description.en: A newspaper published in Hong Kong, where Xu Dixin was a member of the editorial board.

description.zh-cn: 一份在香港发行的报纸，许涤新曾任其副刊主编。
description.en: A newspaper published in Hong Kong, where Xu Dixin served as the chief editor of its supplement.

description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Shanghai. Xu Dixin served as its committee member and head of the United Front Work Department.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期华东地区的财经领导机构，许涤新曾任副主任。
description.en: The financial and economic leading body in the East China region during the early days of the People's Republic of China. Xu Dixin served as its deputy director.

description.en: The financial and economic leading body of Shanghai during the early days of the People's Republic of China. Xu Dixin served as its deputy director.

description.zh-cn: 上海市负责市场监督管理和行政执法的政府部门，许涤新曾任局长。
description.en: The government department in Shanghai responsible for market supervision and administrative law enforcement. Xu Dixin served as its director.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会负责统一战线工作的职能部门，许涤新曾任副部长。
description.en: The functional department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China responsible for united front work. Xu Dixin served as its deputy head.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的一个政府机构，许涤新曾任局长。
description.en: A government agency of the People's Republic of China, where Xu Dixin served as director.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国哲学社会科学研究的最高学术机构和综合研究中心，许涤新曾任副院长。
description.en: The highest academic institution and comprehensive research center for philosophy and social sciences in the People's Republic of China. Xu Dixin served as its vice president.

zh-cn: 中国社会科学院经济研究所

description.zh-cn: 中国社会科学院下属的经济学研究机构，许涤新曾任所长。
description.en: An economics research institute under the Chinese Academy of Social Sciences, where Xu Dixin served as director.

description.zh-cn: 位于广东省汕头市的综合性大学，许涤新曾任校长。
description.en: A comprehensive university in Shantou, Guangdong, where Xu Dixin served as president.

description.en: The first session of the highest state authority in the People's Republic of China, of which Xu Dixin was a delegate.

description.en: The third session of the highest state authority in the People's Republic of China, of which Xu Dixin was a delegate.

description.en: The fifth session of the highest state authority in the People's Republic of China, where Xu Dixin was a member of its Standing Committee.

description.en: The sixth session of the highest state authority in the People's Republic of China, where Xu Dixin was a member of its Standing Committee.

description.zh-cn: 经杜国庠介绍，许涤新加入中国共产党。
description.en: Through Du Guoxiang's introduction, Xu Dixin joined the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 由于叛徒告密被国民党逮捕入狱。
description.en: Was arrested and imprisoned by the Kuomintang due to being betrayed.

description.zh-cn: 卢沟桥事变后，国共合作的背景促成了许涤新等政治犯的释放。
description.en: After the Marco Polo Bridge Incident, the context of KMT-CPC cooperation facilitated the release of political prisoners like Xu Dixin.

description.zh-cn: 经八路军南京办事处交涉，许涤新得以释放。
description.en: Xu Dixin was released after negotiations by the Nanjing Office of the Eighth Route Army.
